name: Army Base Camp Parking
description:
Become a real army trucker while playing the army base parking game. This parking game simulator will give you the most realistic experience of car parking and truck parking in the real 3D environment. Drive a monster army truck loaded with heavy ammunition and machinery and Then Park it on the destination mark with extreme care. Your little mistake can below your army truck simulator and your 3D parking game will be over. So be careful while driving this heavy loader cargo truck on off road tracks in the army base camp and show your best car parking and car driving skills. Drive different heavy vehicles like, 6x6 SUVs and cargo truck simulators and enjoy the real life 3D environment.

The army base parking game is just like other car parking games but have many unique features in it. It is specially designed to enhance and improve you truck parking and truck driving skills. Drive in the strict army game environment and don’t lose your grip on the wheel of 18 wheeler cargo truck. The explosives are really sensitive so be the best army driver of the world while doing this heavy cargo duty. Use the best drifting and parking skills and there is no need for nitro boost because this game is all about parking and drifting. Park the military trucks in the army base camp garage and enjoy the most unique commando game of all times. Rush through the difficult hurdles and obstacles like a crazy truck driver and park truck like a pro driver.

Brace yourself for the real insane army truck driving game and sit behind the wheel of army monster truck simulator. This truck simulation game gives you the best driving and parking experience along with the view of beautiful army base camp. The commando truck driving game is easy to play but only for pro truckers. There are multiple thrilling game missions in this car parking game. Enjoy the most realistic car parking simulation while playing each parking truck mission. Use the multiple camera views to become a perfect army truck driver. Use the steering wheel to drive the off road truck simulator and experience the smooth and easy army base parking game controls. Army truck driver duty is really challenging, so buckle for the real challenge and play and enjoy the most unique army commando game ever.
 
How to Play:
• Tap on gear to drive the monster truck simulator forward or reverse as per required.
• Use the break button to stop the 4x4 off road truck.
• Using the steering vehicle to control the car simulators.
• Park on the specific location with extreme care.
• Complete the each challenging mission within the time limit.

Features of Army Base Parking Game:
• Most realistic army truck parking simulation game.
• Learn in 3D simulation mode, how to park a truck.
• A wide collection of sports cars and turbo cars along with army trucks.
• Marvelous graphics and excellent GUI.
• Different camera views for maximum realistic car driving simulation experience.
• Off road asphalt tracks with xtreme obstacles and hurdles.
• Time deadline for each thrilling mission.
• High Quality sounds and real roaring of formula cars engines.
• Easy and smooth gameplay.
• Nitro boost for drifting and parking.
